dialogues.text: Ugh.. That was a long drop. I don't think we're able to be of much help. You should look around for a way to get back up.
Did I see that right? There was a cave troll down here? Oh thank god, we would've been stew if it weren't for you...
Now, we should focus on finding a way out... Maybe you can find something in the cave that we can use to get back up?
Great, I see you managed to find some rope. Let's toss it up and get out of here...
We'll get back to Shamrock Town now. Many thanks, adventurer.
